question: [Explain] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (178, 129), (41, 112), (110, 120), (128, 87), (117, 193).

qas.question: [Explain] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (178, 129), (41, 112), (110, 120), (128, 87), (117, 193).
[Explain] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (178, 129), (41, 112), (110, 120), (128, 87), (117, 193). Respond only with the area.
[Explain] English: Determine area and perimeter for the polygon passing through (178, 129), (41, 112), (110, 120), (128, 87), (117, 193). Respond only with the number of vertices.
